name: Tutorial - Stars and Carriers
description: Learn how to purchase a carrier, move the carrier and capture neutral stars.

name: Tutorial - Infrastructure and Expansion
description: Effectively build and utilize Economy and Industry infrastructure to generate ships and capture a neutral star.

name: Tutorial - Science and Research
description: Utilize science infrastructure for research, scan surrounding stars for enemy presence, understand hyperspace travel ranges, and apply these skills to capture a neutral star in the game Solaris.

name: Tutorial - Combat Basics
description: Your ultimate test is here: capture the enemy's home star!

name: Tutorial - Special Star Types
description: Learn about the strategic advantages and disadvantages of Special Stars and the benefits of building Warp Gates.

name: Tutorial - Star Specialists
description: [Non-combat] Same as the black hole example, but the player must build a telescope array to see an unclaimed star.

name: Tutorial - Carrier Specialists
description: [Non-combat] An explorer to bridge a gap.

name: Tutorial - Combat Intermediate
description: Simple 1v1 map, but now with specialists enabled, guide the player to buy a Colonel and an Orbital Cannon at the beginning, enemy has a nebula, etc.
